description: This table contains information about the type or types of anesthesia (if any) that a woman would like to have during labor and delivery.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PLAN_ANESTHESIA_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to indicate what type of anesthesia (if any) that a patient plans to request for L&D.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


None


Local


Spinal


General


Epidural


Pudendal
